transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Angela, this is your FINAL WARNING. You have 24 hours to pay $7,800 or we're filing a lawsuit!

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Wait, who are you? I don't even know what this is about!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Don't play stupid with me. You took out a payday loan and never paid it back. That's THEFT! We can have you arrested for this!

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Arrested? That doesn't sound legal. I need documentation.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You'll get your documentation when the sheriff serves you papers at your job! How would you like that? Everyone at your workplace will know you're a criminal!

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I don't think you're allowed to talk to me this way.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can talk to you however I want! You're a liar and a thief! Pay NOW or face criminal charges! This is your last chance!

outcome: Customer hung up - high complaint risk
